tika-s0104t0:14_0: Saṅkhepattā ca sotūhi, sammā ñātuṁ sudukkarā;
tika-s0104t0:25_2: mahāveyyākaraṇoyamācariyo saṁvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmapayojanādividhānāni karonto paṭhamaṁ tāva
tika-s0104t0:25_4: Ettha ca saṁvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṁ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā.
tika-s0104t0:26_0: “Saṁvaṇṇanārambhe satthari paṇāmakaraṇaṁ dhammassa svākkhātabhāvena satthari pasādajananatthaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:26_2: Tadubhayappasādā hi mahato atthassa siddhi hotī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:27_4: Atha vā “saṁvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayavandanā saṁvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa pabhavanissayavisuddhipaṭivedanatthaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:27_6: taṁ sammadeva tesaṁ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanattha”nti.
tika-s0104t0:27_10: āyatiṁ paresaṁ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato ca saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:27_11: Atha vā “catugambhīrabhāvayuttaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṁvaṇṇetukāmassa mahāsamuddaṁ ogāhantassa viya paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatassāpi
tika-s0104t0:27_15: Atha vā “asattharipi satthābhinivesassa lokassa yathābhūtaṁ satthari eva sammāsambuddhe satthusambhāvanatthaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:27_17: ‘tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī’ti ca vuttadosapariharaṇatthaṁ saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ paṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:27_18: Atha vā “buddhassa bhagavato paṇāmavidhānena sammāsambuddhabhāvādhigamāya buddhayānaṁ paṭipajjantānaṁ ussāhajananatthaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:27_19: saddhammassa ca paṇāmavidhānena paccekabuddhabhāvādhigamāya paccekabuddhayānaṁ paṭipajjantānaṁ ussāhajananatthaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:27_20: saṅghassa ca paṇāmavidhānena paramatthasaṅghabhāvādhigamāya sāvakayānaṁ paṭipajjantānaṁ ussāhajananatthaṁ saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ paṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:27_23: bahumatāni ca bhavantīti evaṁladdhikānaṁ cittaparitosanatthaṁ saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ paṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:27_24: Atha vā “sotujanānaṁ yathāvuttapaṇāmena anantarāyena uggahaṇadhāraṇādinipphādanatthaṁ saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ paṇāmakiriyā.
tika-s0104t0:27_25: Sotujanānuggahameva hi padhānaṁ katvā ācariyehi saṁvaṇṇanārambhe thutipaṇāmaparidīpakāni vākyāni nikkhipīyanti,
tika-s0104t0:27_26: itarathā vināpi taṁ nikkhepaṁ kāyamanopaṇāmeneva yathādhippetappayojanasiddhito kimetena ganthagāravakaraṇenā”ti ca evamādinā.
tika-s0104t0:27_28: tasmā saṁvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṁ yathāpaṭiññātasaṁvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:27_32: Ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇañhi yathāpaṭiññātasaṁvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthaṁ ratanattayapūjāya paññāpāṭavabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:28_1: nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:30_0: “Ujugatacitto kho pana mahānāma ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:31_0: Samādhissa ca paññāya padaṭṭhānabhāvo “samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”ti vuttoyeva.
tika-s0104t0:31_1: Tato evaṁ paṭubhūtāya paññāya khedamabhibhuyya paṭiññātaṁ saṁvaṇṇanaṁ samāpayissati.
tika-s0104t0:31_4: Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavaḍḍhanato anantarāyena parisamāpanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:33_0: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṁ bala”nti. ;
tika-s0104t0:34_0: Tato āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavuddhiyā hotveva kāriyaniṭṭhānanti vuttaṁ “ratanattayapūjāya āyu…pe…

tika-s0104t0:35_9: sovacassatā”ti tato paṭibhānāparihānena hotveva yathāpaṭiññātaparisamāpananti vuttaṁ “ratanattaya…pe…
tika-s0104t0:35_11: Atha vā pasādavatthūsu pūjāya puññātisayabhāvato anantarāyena parisamāpanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:39_0: Na sakkā puññaṁ saṅkhātuṁ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
tika-s0104t0:43_0: Upāyesu ca paṭipannassa hotveva kāriyaniṭṭhānanti vuttaṁ “pasādavatthūsu…pe…
tika-s0104t0:43_2: Evaṁ ratanattayapūjā niratisayapuññakkhettasambuddhiyā aparimeyyappabhāvo puññātisayoti bahuvidhantarāyepi
tika-s0104t0:43_5: Tasmā suvuttaṁ “saṁvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṁ yathāpaṭiññātasaṁvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabba”nti.
tika-s0104t0:44_0: Evaṁ pana sapayojanaṁ ratanattayapaṇāmaṁ kattukāmo buddharatanamūlakattā sesaratanānaṁ paṭhamaṁ tassa paṇāmaṁ kātumāha –
tika-s0104t0:44_7: candakiraṇasamuppāditapīṇito loko viya saṅgho”ti evamādīhi aṭṭhakathāyamāgataupamāhi vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0104t0:44_8: Atha vā sabbasattānaṁ aggoti katvā paṭhamaṁ buddho,
tika-s0104t0:44_13: “Sabbasattānaṁ vā hite viniyojakoti katvā paṭhamaṁ buddho,
tika-s0104t0:44_15: hitādhigamāya paṭipanno adhigatahito cāti katvā tadanantaraṁ saṅgho vutto”ti aṭṭhakathāgatanayena anupubbatā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:45_0: Buddharatanapaṇāmañca karonto kevalapaṇāmato thomanāpubbaṅgamovasātisayoti “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādipadehi thomanāpubbaṅgamataṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:45_4: tena cassa khettaṅgatassa paṇāmassa yathādhippetanipphattihetubhāvo dassitoti.
tika-s0104t0:45_8: nāpi abhidhammadesanā viya paññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva thomanamārabhati.
tika-s0104t0:45_15: Vinayadesanā hi āsayādinirapekkhakevalakaruṇāya pākatikasattenāpi asotabbārahaṁ suṇanto,
tika-s0104t0:45_18: Tathā hi ukkaṁsapariyantagatahirottappopi bhagavā lokiyasādhujanehipi pariharitabbāni “sikharaṇī,
tika-s0104t0:45_21: taṁtaṁsikkhāpadapaññatti kāraṇāpekkhāya ca verañjādīsu sārīrikaṁ khedamanubhosi.
tika-s0104t0:45_22: Tasmā kiñcāpi bhūmantarapaccayākārasamayantarakathānaṁ viya vinayapaññattiyāpi samuṭṭhāpikā paññā anaññasādhāraṇatāya atisayakiccavatī,
tika-s0104t0:45_23: karuṇāya kiccaṁ pana tatopi adhikanti vinayadesanāya karuṇāppadhānatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:45_25: abhidhammadesanā pana kevalapaññāppadhānā paramatthadhammānaṁ yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhasamatthāya paññāya tattha sātisayappavattito.
tika-s0104t0:45_26: Suttantadesanā pana karuṇāpaññāppadhānā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ āsayānusayādhimutticaritādibhedaparicchindanasamatthāya
tika-s0104t0:45_27: paññāya sattesu ca mahākaruṇāya tattha sātisayappavattito.
tika-s0104t0:45_28: Suttantadesanāya hi mahākaruṇāya samāpattibahulo vineyyasantāne tadajjhāsayānulomena gambhīramatthapadaṁ patiṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0104t0:45_29: Tasmā ārambhānurūpaṁ karuṇāpaññāppadhānameva thomanaṁ katanti veditabbaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:46_7: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṁ kampanaṁ hadayakhedaṁ karotīti vā karuṇā.
tika-s0104t0:46_10: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṁ sukhaṁ rundhati vibandhatīti,
tika-s0104t0:46_16: hadayaṁ vā te phālessāmī”ti ettha uro “hadaya”nti vuttaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:46_18: “hadayā hadayaṁ maññe aññāya tacchatī”ti ettha cittaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:46_20: Attano sabhāvaṁ vā haratīti hadayaṁ, ra-
tika-s0104t0:47_1: byāpādādīnaṁ ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca sattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārappavattiyā mettāmuditānampi cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati,
tika-s0104t0:47_2: tathāpi paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā parūpatāpāsahanarasā avihiṁsābhūtā karuṇāva visesena bhagavato
tika-s0104t0:47_3: cittassa cittapassaddhi viya sītibhāvanimittanti tassāyeva cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:47_4: Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:47_8: niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ viya savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvamupagatā anaññasādhāraṇasātisayabhāvappattā
tika-s0104t0:47_10: Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṁ paresaṁ hitopasaṁhārasukhādiaparihānijjhānasabhāvatāya sātisaye hadayasītalabhāvanibandhanatte
tika-s0104t0:47_11: sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya tāsampi kāraṇanti karuṇāya eva hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:47_16: Tīsu cettha vikappesu paṭhame vikappe avisesabhūtā buddhabhūmigatā,
tika-s0104t0:47_18: tatiye paṭhamābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya tīsupi avatthāsu pavattā bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:48_4: Sāyeva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto.
tika-s0104t0:48_5: Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkenapi nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu ekapajjotā hoti.
tika-s0104t0:48_21: Sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanato andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti mohatamo.
tika-s0104t0:48_22: Satipi tamasaddassa sadisakappanamantarena avijjāvācakatte mohasaddasannidhānena tabbisesakatāvettha yuttāti sadisakappanā.
tika-s0104t0:49_0: Nanu ca sabbesampi khīṇāsavānaṁ paññāpajjotena avijjandhakārahatatā sambhavati,
tika-s0104t0:49_1: atha kasmā aññasādhāraṇāvisesaguṇena bhagavato thomanā vuttāti?
tika-s0104t0:49_3: Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṁ paññāpajjotahatāvijjandhakārattepi sati saddhādhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṁ
tika-s0104t0:49_4: sāvakapaccekabuddhehi sammāsambuddhānaṁ savāsanappahānena kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatevāti.
tika-s0104t0:49_5: Atha vā paropadesamantarena attano santāne accantaṁ avijjandhakāravigamassa nipphāditattā (nibbattitattā ma. ni. ṭī. 1.1),
tika-s0104t0:49_6: tattha ca sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā,
tika-s0104t0:49_9: Imasmiñca atthavikappe paññāpajjotapadena sasantānagatamohavidhamanā paṭivedhapaññā ceva parasantānagatamohavidhamanā
tika-s0104t0:49_12: Na tu purimasmiṁ atthavikappe viya paṭivedhapaññāyevāti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:50_4: Imasmiṁ pana atthavikappe mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṁ kāraṇūpacārena sakasantāne mohatamavidhamananti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:50_6: parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato phalūpacārena anāvaraṇañāṇameva mohatamavidhamananti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:50_11: visayappavattimukhena pana aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṁ dvidhā katvā chaḷāsādhāraṇañāṇabhede vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:51_0: Kiṁ panettha kāraṇaṁ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanāya gayhati,
tika-s0104t0:51_2: tappahānavacaneneva hi tadekaṭṭhatāya sakalasaṁkilesasamugghātassa jotitabhāvato niravasesakilesappahānamettha gayhati.
tika-s0104t0:51_7: saṁsārappavattiyā ca avijjāyeva padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacaneneva sakalasaṁkilesasamugghātavacanasiddhito soyeveko gayhatīti.
tika-s0104t0:51_8: Atha vā sakalasaṁkilesadhammānaṁ muddhabhūtattā avijjāya taṁ samugghātoyeveko gayhati. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t0:54_0: Sanarāmaralokagarunti ettha pana paṭhamapakatiyā avibhāgena sattopi naroti vuccati,
tika-s0104t0:54_3: “Yathā hi paṭhamapakatibhūto satto itarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena pure uccaṭṭhāne seti pavattatīti purisoti vuccati,
tika-s0104t0:54_5: Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṁ pituṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0104t0:54_11: amarehi cāti sanarāmaro.Garati uggacchati uggato pākaṭo bhavatīti garu,
tika-s0104t0:58_2: gurūti ca dvidhā gahetvā bhāriyavācakatte garusaddo,
tika-s0104t0:58_5: Pāḷivisaye hi sabbesampi yathāvuttānamatthānaṁ vācakatte garusaddoyevicchitabbo akārassa ākārabhāvena
tika-s0104t0:58_7: Sakkatabhāsāvisaye pana gurusaddoyevicchitabbo ukārassa vuddhibhāvena aññathā taddhitantapadassa dassanatoti.
tika-s0104t0:58_8: Sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti sanarāmaraloko,
tika-s0104t0:58_13: Atthato hi dīghāyukāpi samānā yathāparicchedaṁ maraṇasabhāvattā marūti devā vuccanti.
tika-s0104t0:58_14: Etena devamanussānaṁ viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṁ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakārakataṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:58_19: añño atthakkamoti saddakkamānusārena padhānāpadhānabhāvo na codetabbo.
tika-s0104t0:58_20: Edisesu hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṁ viya niddisīyati yathā taṁ “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:63_1: garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokavasena attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0104t0:63_7: samūhattho ettha lokasaddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti katvā.
tika-s0104t0:63_12: Amarasaddena cettha upapattidevā viya visuddhidevāpi saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0104t0:63_14: Imasmiṁ pana atthavikappe narāmarānameva gahaṇaṁ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
tika-s0104t0:63_15: Tathā hi sabbānatthaparihānapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā,
tika-s0104t0:63_16: sadevamanussāya pajāya accantamupakāritāya aparimitanirupamappabhāvaguṇasamaṅgitāya ca sabbasattuttamo
tika-s0104t0:63_17: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ uttamamanaññasādhāraṇaṁ gāravaṭṭhānanti.
tika-s0104t0:63_19: padhānabhūtaṁ pana lokaṁ dassetuṁ purisaliṅgena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:63_20: Neruttikā pana avisesanicchitaṭṭhāne tathā niddiṭṭhamicchanti yathā “narā nāgā ca gandhabbā,
tika-s0104t0:69_10: Bhagavato hi vineyyajanopasaṅkamanaṁ ekantena tesaṁ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:69_17: Atha vā “sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṁ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
tika-s0104t0:69_22: Tathā lokasamudayaṁ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammatamāpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato.
tika-s0104t0:69_23: Lokanirodhaṁ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato.
tika-s0104t0:69_24: Lokanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato,
tika-s0104t0:69_26: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatī’ti sugatotiādinā niddesanayena vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0104t0:70_3: Bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasaṁhitaṁ yathārahaṁ kālayuttameva vācaṁ vineyyānaṁ sammā gadatīti vā sugato, da-
tika-s0104t0:70_10: sakalassāpi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena nivattitattā pañcahipi tāhi visaṁyutto hutvā muttoti gativimutto.
tika-s0104t0:70_11: Uddhamuddhabhavagāmino hi devā taṁtaṁkammavipākadānakālānurūpena tato tato bhavato muttāpi muttamattāva,
tika-s0104t0:70_15: Bhagavā pana yathāvuttappakārena visaṁyutto hutvā muttoti.
tika-s0104t0:70_16: Tasmā anena bhagavato katthacipi gatiyā apariyāpannataṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:73_0: Te mayhaṁ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0104t0:74_0: Taṁtaṁgatisaṁvattanakānañhi kammakilesānaṁ mahābodhimūleyeva aggamaggena pahīnattā natthi bhagavato taṁtaṁgatipariyāpannatāti
tika-s0104t0:74_2: Atha vā kāmaṁ saupādisesāyapi nibbānadhātuyā tāhi gatīhi vimutto,
tika-s0104t0:74_3: esā pana “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etthevantogadhāti iminā padena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāva thometīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:75_0: Ettha pana attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena dvīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti.
tika-s0104t0:75_4: lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa pana sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanāpayogato devadattādīsupi viruddhasattesu niccaṁ hitajjhāsayatā,
tika-s0104t0:75_7: parahitapaṭipatti tividhā ca attahitasampatti imāya gāthāya yathārahaṁ pakāsitā hoti.
tika-s0104t0:76_0: Atha vā hetuphalasattūpakāravasena tīhākārehi thomanā katā.
tika-s0104t0:76_14: rūpakāyasampadā sobhanakāyagamanatthena sugatasaddena lakkhaṇānubyañjanapāripūriyā vinā tadabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:76_16: sā pana sammā gadanatthena sugatasaddena pakāsitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:77_1: tappaṭipattiyādayo aneke buddhaguṇā ācariyena pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0104t0:77_3: yadidaṁ yena kenaci pakārena atthantaraviññāpanaṁ. Kathaṁ?
tika-s0104t0:77_5: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṁsārapaṅkato sattānaṁ samuddharaṇatthaṁ katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-s0104t0:77_6: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhimadhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:77_10: Sammā gamanatthena sugatasaddena sammāsambodhiyā paṭipattiṁ dasseti līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogasassatucchedābhinivesādiantadvayarahitāya
tika-s0104t0:77_15: Tesu ca padhānena payojanena parahitapaṭipattiṁ dasseti,
tika-s0104t0:77_17: tadubhayena ca attahitapaṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṁ pakāseti.
tika-s0104t0:78_0: Apica karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato sabbalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā,
tika-s0104t0:78_5: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṁ bhagavato pavattiṁ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā karuṇāya,
tika-s0104t0:78_7: Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṁ sabhāvaṁ atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṁ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:78_21: sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṁ anekesaṁ paññāpabhedānaṁ vasena ñāṇacāraṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:78_37: paññāggahaṇena sabbadhammesu virattacittatā dassitā hoti sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṁ karuṇā ādi tannidānabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:78_39: Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti.
tika-s0104t0:78_40: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti.
tika-s0104t0:78_46: paññā pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato dassitattā.
tika-s0104t0:78_47: Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṁ dassanupāyo,
tika-s0104t0:78_49: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṁ niravasesato dassetuṁ.
tika-s0104t0:83_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenāpi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṁ pati bhagavatā anuyuttena “no hetaṁ bhante”ti
tika-s0104t0:83_1: paṭikkhipitvā “api ca me bhante dhammanvayo vidito”ti sampasādanīyasutte vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:84_0: Evaṁ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavato thomanāpubbaṅgamaṁ paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni saddhammassāpi
tika-s0104t0:84_4: saha pubbabhāgapaṭipattidhammena vā ariyamaggabhūtaṁ dhammaṁ bhāvetvā ceva yaṁ phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṁ dhammaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:84_5: pariyattidhammapaṭipattidhammehi vā saha phalanibbānabhūtaṁ dhammaṁ sacchikatvā ca sammāsambodhisaṅkhātaṁ buddhabhāvamupagato,
tika-s0104t0:85_1: Bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā niddesanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:85_2: Atha vā aggamaggañāṇādhigamena savāsanāya sammohaniddāya accantavigamanato,
tika-s0104t0:85_4: Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvāgahaṇato kammavacanicchāyābhāvena
tika-s0104t0:85_7: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:85_8: Evañca katvā kammavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā,
tika-s0104t0:85_9: atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhuñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhastaniravasesakilesomahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro
tika-s0104t0:86_0: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
tika-s0104t0:87_1: tena evaṁ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā īdisaṁ dhammaṁ bhāvetvā,
tika-s0104t0:87_3: kā nāma kathā aññesaṁ sāvakādibhāvamupagamaneti dhamme sambhāvanaṁ dīpeti.
tika-s0104t0:88_0: “Yena yena nimittena, buddhi saddo ca vattate;
tika-s0104t0:90_2: Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṁ katvā. Ceva- saddo ca-
tika-s0104t0:90_4: Tena hi saddadvayena na kevalaṁ bhagavā dhammassa bhāvanāmattena buddhabhāvamupagato,
tika-s0104t0:90_10: Vītamalanti ettha virahavasena eti pavattatīti vīto,
tika-s0104t0:90_15: evaṁ sati saupasaggo viya anupasaggopi gatasaddo virahatthavācako veditabbo dhātūnamanekatthattā.
tika-s0104t0:90_21: saṁsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-s0104t0:90_24: sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyassa ca labbhamānattā pariyattidhammopi idha saṅgahito.
tika-s0104t0:90_26: tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:90_27: tathā “yaṁ dhammaṁ bhāvetvā sacchikatvā”ti ca vuttattā bhāvanāsacchikiriyāyogyatāya buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi
tika-s0104t0:90_28: pāramitāhi saha pubbabhāgaadhisīlasikkhādayopi idha saṅgahitāti veditabbā.

tika-s0104t0:90_37: bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṁ pesetvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhisaṅkhātaṁ
tika-s0104t0:91_0: Imāya pana gāthāya vijjāvimuttisampadādīhi anekehi guṇehi yathārahaṁ saddhammaṁ thometi. Kathaṁ?
tika-s0104t0:91_21: Atha vā “yaṁ dhammaṁ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṁ upagato”ti etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṁ thometi,
tika-s0104t0:91_27: Paṭhamena vā saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhehi sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhehi,
tika-s0104t0:91_28: dutiyena saha asaṅkhatadhātuyā asekkhehi dhammaṁ thometi.
tika-s0104t0:92_0: “Vītamala”nti iminā pana saṁkilesābhāvadīpanena visuddhatāya dhammaṁ thometi,
tika-s0104t0:93_0: Evaṁ saṅkhepeneva sabbasaddhammaguṇehi saddhammassāpi thomanāpubbaṅgamaṁ paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni ariyasaṅghassāpi
tika-s0104t0:93_6: attajo khettajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidhesu puttesu attajā,
tika-s0104t0:93_8: Yathā hi manussānaṁ orasaputtā attajātatāya pitusantakassa dāyajjassa visesabhāgino honti,
tika-s0104t0:93_9: evametepi saddhammasavanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa dhammaratanassa ca dāyajjassa visesabhāginoti.
tika-s0104t0:93_10: Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṁ okkamamānā,
tika-s0104t0:93_11: okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato ure vāyāmajanitābhijātatāya sadisakappanamantarena nippariyāyeneva “orasā”ti vattabbatamarahanti.
tika-s0104t0:93_13: vajjānucintanena ca hadaye katvā vajjato nivāretvā anavajje patiṭṭhāpentena sīlādidhammasarīraposanena saṁvaḍḍhāpitā.
tika-s0104t0:93_15: tassa me tumhe puttā orasā mukhato jātā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:93_18: lakkhaṇādivisesābhāvato ca “bhagavato dhammadesanā” icceva saṅkhyaṁ gatā,
tika-s0104t0:93_20: etena catubbidhesu puttesu ariyasaṅghassa attajaputtabhāvaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:93_25: dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā cittārādhanena ca tappaṭibhāgatāya bhagavato puttā nāma, tesaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:94_0: Saṁkilesanimittaṁ hutvā guṇaṁ māreti vibādhatīti māro,
tika-s0104t0:94_4: mārañca mārasenañca mathenti vilothentīti mārasenamathanā, tesaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:94_10: Nanu ca ariyasāvakānaṁ maggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāyakaraṇatthaṁ devaputtamāro vā mārasenā vā na apasādeti,
tika-s0104t0:94_13: Tesañhi apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe saṁkilese vimathite tepi vimathitā nāma hontīti.
tika-s0104t0:94_14: Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṁ viya devaputtamārassāpi guṇamāraṇe sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo idha “mārasenā”ti vuccati yathāha bhagavā –
tika-s0104t0:95_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
tika-s0104t0:96_0: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
tika-s0104t0:97_0: Pañcamaṁ thinamiddhaṁ te, chaṭṭhā bhīrū pavuccati;
tika-s0104t0:98_0: Sattamī vicikicchā te, makkho thambho te aṭṭhamo.
tika-s0104t0:104_0: Na naṁ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukha”nti. ;
tika-s0104t0:105_7: Apica khandhābhisaṅkhāramaccudevaputtamārānaṁ tesaṁ sahāyabhāvūpagamanatāya senāsaṅkhātassa kilesamārassa
tika-s0104t0:105_9: Evañca sati pañcamāranimmathanabhāvena attho paripuṇṇo hoti.
tika-s0104t0:105_14: devaputtamārañca samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena kilesamāraṁ mathentīti,
tika-s0104t0:106_1: tenasatipi tesaṁ taṁtaṁbhedena anekasatasahassasaṅkhyābhede ariyabhāvakaramaggaphaladhammabhedena imaṁ
tika-s0104t0:106_2: gaṇanaparicchedaṁ nātivattanti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvānativattanatoti dasseti. Pi- saddo, api-
tika-s0104t0:106_3: saddo vā padalīḷādinā kāraṇena aṭṭhāne payutto,
tika-s0104t0:106_7: Yadipi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci natthi avayavaṁ upādāya samudāyassa vattabbattā,
tika-s0104t0:106_8: aviññāyamānasamudāyaṁ pana viññāyamānasamudāyena visesitumarahatīti āha “aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti,
tika-s0104t0:106_9: etena “ariyasaṅgha”nti ettha na yena kenaci saṇṭhānādinā,
tika-s0104t0:106_19: Atha vā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato upagantabbato,
tika-s0104t0:106_22: samaggaṁ vā kammaṁ samudāyavasena samupagatoti saṅgho,
tika-s0104t0:106_24: ariyo ca so saṅgho ca yathāvuttanayenāti vā ariyasaṅgho,
tika-s0104t0:106_26: Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṁ dassetuṁ idheva “sirasā vande”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:106_28: Keci pana purimagāthāsupi taṁ padamānetvā yojenti,
tika-s0104t0:107_0: Imāya pana gāthāya ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadā pahānasampadādayo aneke guṇā dassitā honti. Kathaṁ?
tika-s0104t0:107_1: “Sugatassa orasānaṁ puttāna”nti hi etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṁ dasseti sammāsambuddhapabhavatādīpanato.
tika-s0104t0:107_5: Atha vā “sugatassa orasānaṁ puttāna”nti ariyasaṅghassa visuddhanissayabhāvadīpanaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:107_9: Tathā “sugatassa orasānaṁ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabbhāvaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:107_10: Lokuttarasaraṇagamanena hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā.
tika-s0104t0:107_14: “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena viddhastavipakkhe sekkhāsekkhadhamme dasseti puggalādhiṭṭhānena maggaphaladhammānaṁ dassitattā.
tika-s0104t0:107_18: asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānantiādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā saṅkhepato sabbepi ariyasaṅghaguṇā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0104t0:108_0: Evaṁ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṁkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni taṁ nipaccakāraṁ
tika-s0104t0:108_6: Tassa “yaṁ puññaṁ mayā laddha”nti pāṭhasesena sambandho,
tika-s0104t0:108_19: Sadisakappanamaññatra pana yathāvuttavacanattheneva buddhādīnaṁ ratanabhāvo yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:108_20: Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjantassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṁ anappakaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t0:109_1: nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:109_4: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti tathāgataṁ ārabbha.
tika-s0104t0:109_5: Ujugatacitto kho pana mahānāma ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:113_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā sātisayato buddhādīsuyeva labbhantīti.
tika-s0104t0:113_16: Avayavavinimuttassa pana samudāyassa abhāvato tīṇi eva ratanāni tathā vuccanti,
tika-s0104t0:113_21: Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi tiṇṇaṁ ratanānaṁ guṇaninnatā,
tika-s0104t0:113_23: Apica tassā cetanāya sahajātādopakāreko saddhāpaññāsativīriyādisampayuttadhammo vandanā,
tika-s0104t0:114_0: Taṁtaṁsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo,
tika-s0104t0:114_2: Paṇāmapayojane vuttavidhinā suṭṭhu vihato viddhasto antarāyo assāti suvihatantarāyo.
tika-s0104t0:117_0: Vuttesu hi atthesu idha sattiyaṁ vattati.
tika-s0104t0:117_1: Anu punappunaṁ taṁsamaṅgiṁ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti hi anubhāvo,
tika-s0104t0:117_3: atthato pana yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa purimakammassa balānuppadānavasasaṅkhātā vandanāmayapuññassa sattiyeva,
tika-s0104t0:118_0: Ettha pana “pasannamatino”ti etena attano pasādasampattiṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:118_2: tato ca tassa puññassa attano pasādasampattiyā,
tika-s0104t0:118_3: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyāti dvīhi aṅgehi atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya upaghātakaupaddavānaṁ vihanane samatthataṁ dīpeti.
tika-s0104t0:118_4: Caturaṅgasampattiyā dānacetanā viya hi dvayaṅgasampattiyā paṇāmacetanāpi antarāyavihananena diṭṭhadhammikāti.
tika-s0104t0:119_0: Evaṁ ratanattayassa nipaccakārakaraṇe payojanaṁ dassetvā idāni yassā dhammadesanāya atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇetukāmo,
tika-s0104t0:119_3: yadidaṁ taṁtaṁsaṁvaṇṇanāsu ādito tassa tassa saṁvaṇṇetabbadhammassa visesaguṇakittanena thomanā.
tika-s0104t0:122_3: anena “dīgho”ti ayaṁ imassa āgamassa atthānugatā samaññāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:122_7: paññattito pana suttāni upādāya āgamabhāvassa paññattattā avayavehi suttehi avayavībhūto āgamo aṅkīyati.
tika-s0104t0:122_15: Apica āgamasammatehi bāhirakapaveditehi bhāratapurāṇakathānarasīhapurāṇakathādīhi varotipi āgamavaro, tassa.
tika-s0104t0:122_17: buddhānaṁ saccapaṭivedhaṁ anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā,
tika-s0104t0:122_20: Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca,
tika-s0104t0:122_22: Sammāsambuddheneva hi tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṁ atthasaṁvaṇṇanākkamo bhāsito,
tika-s0104t0:122_23: tato paraṁ saṅgāyanādivasena sāvakehīti ācariyā vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:122_25: Bhagavatā hi abyākataṁ tantipadaṁ nāma natthi,
tika-s0104t0:122_28: Nanu ca sabbampi buddhavacanaṁ tepiṭakaṁ saddhāvahaguṇameva,
tika-s0104t0:122_34: anuttariyasuttādīsu visesato buddhaguṇavibhāvanena ratanattaye sātisayaṁ saddhaṁ āvahatīti.
tika-s0104t0:123_0: Evaṁ saṁvaṇṇetabbadhammassa abhitthavanampi katvā idāni saṁvaṇṇanāya sampati vakkhamānāya āgamanavisuddhiṁ dassetuṁ “atthappakāsanattha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:123_1: Imāya hi gāthāya saṅgītittayamāruḷhadīghāgamaṭṭhakathātova sīhaḷabhāsāmattaṁ vinā ayaṁ vakkhamānasaṁvaṇṇanā āgatā, nāññato,
tika-s0104t0:123_5: paramanipuṇagambhīraṁ buddhavisayamāgamavaraṁ attano baleneva vaṇṇayissāmīti aññehi vattumpi asakkuṇeyyattā
tika-s0104t0:123_7: Imāya hi pubbācariyānubhāvaṁ nissāyeva tassa atthaṁ vaṇṇayissāmīti attano saṁvaṇṇanānissayaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:123_23: Akkharacintakāpi hi “tathānaṁṭṭha yuga”nti lakkhaṇaṁ vatvā idamevudāharanti.
tika-s0104t0:126_4: tesaṁ satehi pañcahi.Yā saṅgītāti yā aṭṭhakathā atthaṁ pakāsetuṁ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayametassa attho,
tika-s0104t0:126_6: Anusaṅgītā ca pacchāpīti na kevalaṁ paṭhamasaṅgītiyameva,
tika-s0104t0:126_8: Na ca pañcahi vasisatehi ādito saṅgītāyeva,
tika-s0104t0:126_9: api tu yasattherādīhi anusaṅgītā cāti saha samuccayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:127_0: Atha porāṇaṭṭhakathāya vijjamānāya kimetāya adhunā puna katāya saṁvaṇṇanāyāti punaruttiyā,
tika-s0104t0:127_1: niratthakatāya ca dosaṁ samanussaritvā taṁ pariharanto “sīhaḷadīpa”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:127_2: Taṁ pariharaṇeneva hi imissā saṁvaṇṇanāya nimittaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:127_3: Tattha sīhaṁ lāti gaṇhātīti sīhaḷo la-
tika-s0104t0:127_13: dvidhā vā āpo ettha sandatīti dipo,
tika-s0104t0:127_19: Tadatthasambandhatāya pana purimagāthāya “kāmañca saṅgītā anusaṅgītā cā”ti sānuggahatthayojanā sambhavati.
tika-s0104t0:127_26: Sā hi dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṁ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṁ āropitattā tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāyeva,
tika-s0104t0:127_28: pacchā pana tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṁ sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti.
tika-s0104t0:127_30: Tathā “dīpavāsīnamatthāyā”ti idampi “ṭhapitā”ti ca “apanetvā āropento”ti ca etehi padehi sambajjhitabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:127_39: Sīhaḷabhāsā nāma anekakkharehi ekatthassāpi voharaṇato paresaṁ voharituṁ atidukkarā kañcukasadisā sīhaḷānaṁ samudāciṇṇā bhāsā.
tika-s0104t0:128_1: adhunā kariyamānā pana aṭṭhakathā kathaṁ karīyatīti anuyoge sati imissā aṭṭhakathāya karaṇappakāraṁ dassetumāha “apanetvānā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:128_2: Tattha tato mūlaṭṭhakathāto sīhaḷabhāsaṁ apanetvā potthake anāropitabhāvena niraṅkaritvāti sambandho,
tika-s0104t0:128_3: etena ayaṁ vakkhamānā aṭṭhakathā saṅgītittayamāropitāya mūlaṭṭhakathāya sīhaḷabhāsāpanayanamattamaññatra
tika-s0104t0:128_4: atthato saṁsandati ceva sameti ca yathā “gaṅgodakena yamunodaka”nti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:128_6: Sabhāvaniruttibhāvena hi paṇḍitānaṁ manaṁ ramayatīti manoramā.
tika-s0104t0:128_10: nānātthavisayaṁ vā kaṅkhaṁ taranti etāyāti tanti, pāḷi.
tika-s0104t0:128_11: Tassā nayasaṅkhātāya gatiyā chaviṁ chāyaṁ anugatāti tantinayānucchavikā.
tika-s0104t0:131_0: Vuttaṁ pāḷigatibhāsaṁ potthake likhanavasena āropentoti attho, iminā saddadosābhāvamāha.
tika-s0104t0:132_2: Aviruddhattā eva hi te theravādāpi idha pakāsayissanti.
tika-s0104t0:133_0: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṁsā saṁyamo damo;
tika-s0104t0:135_2: tappariyāpannā hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato taṁ pakārena dīpenti,
tika-s0104t0:135_6: suṭṭhu nipuṇo saṇho vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā.
tika-s0104t0:135_9: suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā.

tika-s0104t0:136_0: Hitvā punappunabhatamatthanti ekattha vutampi puna aññattha ābhatamatthaṁ punaruttibhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:136_1: ganthagarukabhāvato ca cajitvā tassa āgamavarassa atthaṁ pakāsayissāmīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:137_0: Evaṁ karaṇappakārampi dassetvā “dīpavāsīnamatthāyā”ti vuttappayojanato aññampi saṁvaṇṇanāya payojanaṁ dassetuṁ “sujanassa cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:137_5: Teneva ca tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi atthāyāti ayamattho siddho hoti uggahaṇādisukaratāya tesampi bahūpakārattā.
tika-s0104t0:137_9: pariyattidhammassa vā pañcavassasahassaparimāṇaṁ cirakālaṁ ṭhitatthañcāti samuccayatthameva dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:137_10: Pariyattidhammassa hi ṭhitiyā paṭipattidhammapaṭivedhadhammānampi ṭhiti hoti tasseva tesaṁ mūlabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:137_16: tadatthassa ca sunikkhittassa upāyabhāvamupādāya vuttaṁ “ciraṭṭhitatthañca dhammassā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:138_0: “Dveme bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
tika-s0104t0:139_0: Evaṁ payojanampi dassetvā vakkhamānāya saṁvaṇṇanāya mahattapariccāgena ganthagarukabhāvaṁ pariharitumāha “sīlakathā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:139_4: tadekadesabhāvena visuddhimaggo gahetabboti kathikānaṁ upadesaṁ karonto tattha vicāritadhamme uddesavasena dassetumāha “sīlakathā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:139_7: Kammaṭṭhānānīti bhāvanāsaṅkhātassa yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānattā kammaṭṭhānanāmāni dhammajātāni.
tika-s0104t0:139_8: Tāni pana pāḷiyamāgatāni aṭṭhatiṁ seva na gahetabbāni,
tika-s0104t0:139_9: atha kho aṭṭhakathāyamāgatānipi dveti ñāpetuṁ “sabbānipī”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:139_10: Cari yāvidhānasahitoti rāgacaritādīnaṁ sabhāvādividhānena saha pavatto,
tika-s0104t0:140_0: Lokiyalokuttarabhedānaṁ channampi abhiññānaṁ gahaṇatthaṁ “sabbā ca abhiññāyo”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:140_1: Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā bhedena paññāya saṅkalayitvā sampiṇḍetvā,
tika-s0104t0:141_7: Paṭisambhidādīsu āgatanayaṁ avissajjitvāva vicāritattā avimutto tantimaggo yassāti avimuttatanti maggā.
tika-s0104t0:141_8: Maggoti cettha pāḷisaṅkhāto upāyo taṁtadatthānaṁ avabodhassa,
tika-s0104t0:142_5: vattabbassa ca avuttassa avasesassa abhāvato suviññeyyabhāvena suparisuddhaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:142_11: Etaṁ sabbaṁ idha aṭṭhakathāya na vicārayissāmi punaruttibhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:142_13: Vicarayissāmīti ca gāthābhāvato na vuddhibhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:143_0: Evampi esa visuddhimaggo āgamānamatthaṁ na pakāseyya,
tika-s0104t0:143_1: atha sabbopeso idha vicāritabboyevāti codanāya tathā avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṁ niddhāretvā taṁ pariharanto “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:143_2: Tattha majjheti khuddakato aññesaṁ catunnampi āgamānaṁ abbhantare. Hi-
tika-s0104t0:143_8: Api ca saṁvaṇṇakehi saṁvaṇṇanāvasena yaṁ yaṁ bhāsitaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:143_13: idameva vā kāraṇaṁ manasi sannidhāyāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:143_14: Katoti etthāpi “visuddhimaggo esā”ti padaṁ kammabhāvena sambajjhati āvuttiyādinayenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:143_17: Ettha ca “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhattabhāvadīpanena visesato catunnampi āgamānaṁ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggo,
tika-s0104t0:143_19: Avisesato pana vinayābhidhammānampi yathārahaṁ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā hotiyeva,
tika-s0104t0:143_20: tehi sammissatāya ca tadavasesassa khuddakāgamassa visesato sādhāraṇā samānāpi taṁ ṭhapetvā catunnameva āgamānaṁ sādhāraṇātveva vuttāti.
tika-s0104t0:147_0: Evaṁ yathāvuttena vividhena nayena paṇāmādikaṁ pakaraṇārambhavidhānaṁ katvā idāni vibhāgavantānaṁ sabhāvavibhāvanaṁ
tika-s0104t0:147_2: suviññāpitañca hotīti paṭhamaṁ tāva vaggasuttavasena vibhāgaṁ dassetuṁ “tattha dīghāgamo nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:147_3: Tattha tatthāti “dīghassa āgamavarassa atthaṁ pakāsayissāmī”ti yadidaṁ vuttaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:147_6: so dīghāgamo nāma vaggasuttavasena evaṁ veditabbo,
tika-s0104t0:147_15: saddena paṭiniddisati viya “dīghāgamanissita”nti vuttaṁ āsannavacanampi taṁ-
tika-s0104t0:147_16: saddena paṭiniddisati attano buddhiyaṁ parammukhaṁ viya parivattamānaṁ hutvā pavattanato.
tika-s0104t0:147_17: Edisesu hi ṭhānesu attano buddhiyaṁ sammukhaṁ vā parammukhaṁ vā parivattamānaṁ yathā tathā vā paṭiniddisituṁ
tika-s0104t0:147_22: tesaṁ vā saṅgaho gaṇanā etthāti catuttiṁsasuttasaṅgaho.
tika-s0104t0:148_0: Attano saṁvaṇṇanāya paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṁ nikkhittānukkameneva pavattabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ “tassa…pe…
tika-s0104t0:148_3: Kasmā pana catūsu āgamesu dīghāgamo paṭhamaṁ saṅgīto,
tika-s0104t0:148_7: Nāyamanuyogo katthacipi na pavattati sabbattheva vacanakkamamattaṁ paṭicca anuyuñjitabbato.
tika-s0104t0:148_13: katipayasuttasaṅgahatāya ceva appaparimāṇatāya ca uggahaṇadhāraṇādisukhato paṭhamaṁ saṅgīto.
tika-s0104t0:148_18: Tenevāha “tasmā tiha tvaṁ bhikkhu ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
tika-s0104t0:148_22: Diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathābhāvato pana suttantapiṭakassa niravasesadiṭṭhivibhajanaṁ brahmajālasuttaṁ paṭhamaṁ nikkhittanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:148_23: Tepiṭake hi buddhavacane brahmajālasadisaṁ diṭṭhigatāni niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ katvā vibhattasuttaṁ natthi.
tika-s0104t0:148_24: Nidānaṁ pana paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṁ mahākassapattherena puṭṭhena āyasmatā ānandena desakālādinidassanatthaṁ paṭhamaṁ nikkhittanti.
tika-s0104t0:150_1: yassaṁ vā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṁ nikkhittānukkamena saṁvaṇṇanaṁ kattukāmattā taṁ vibhāvento tassā tantiyā
tika-s0104t0:150_2: āruḷhāyapi idha vacane kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ “paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:150_4: māruḷhāti etena nanu sā saṅgītikkhandhake tantimāruḷhā,
tika-s0104t0:150_9: veditabbā”ti pana etena nidānakosallatthabhāvato yathāvuttadosatā na siyāti visesakāraṇadassanena pariharati.
tika-s0104t0:150_12: Tena hi paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṁ nidānañca ādi,
tika-s0104t0:150_13: esā ca paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma evaṁ veditabbāti imamatthaṁ sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0104t0:150_17: yadidaṁ kiñci vatvā puna aparaṁ vattumārabhantānaṁ ca-
tika-s0104t0:150_28: evaṁ sati so na kattabboyeva paṭhamasaddeneva aññāsaṁ dutiyādisaṅgītīnampi atthibhāvassa dassitattā.
tika-s0104t0:150_29: Dutiyādimupādāya hi paṭhamasaddapayogo dīghādimupādāya rassādisaddapayogo viya.
tika-s0104t0:150_31: paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṁ dhammavinayānaṁ saṅgahetvā gāyanaṁ kathanaṁ saṅgīti,
tika-s0104t0:150_34: antarantarā ca sambandhavasena ṭhapitaṁ saṅgītikārakavacanaṁ saṅgahitaṁ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:150_39: tena pāḷiyampi sā saṅgītimāruḷhāvāti anuggahaṁ karoti,
tika-s0104t0:150_40: evampi tatthāruḷhamattena idha sotūnaṁ nidānakosallaṁ na hotīti pana-
tika-s0104t0:150_42: Nidadāti desanaṁ desakālādivasena aviditaṁ viditaṁ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:151_1: Tattha sattānaṁ dassanānuttariyasaraṇādipaṭilābhahetubhūtāsu vijjamānāsupi aññāsu bhagavato kiriyāsu
tika-s0104t0:151_2: “buddho bodheyya”nti paṭiññāya anulomanato vineyyānaṁ maggaphaluppattihetubhūtā kiriyāva nippariyāyena
tika-s0104t0:151_5: Dhammacakkappavattanato pana pubbabhāge bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ suṇantānampi vāsanābhāgiyameva jātaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:151_12: dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṁ cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:153_3: Yaṁ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṁ “dhammacakkapavattanasuttantaṁ desento dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti nāma,
tika-s0104t0:153_7: subhaddassa nāma paribbājakassa vinayanaṁ antoparicchedaṁ katvāti abhividhivasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:153_9: Kataṁ pariniṭṭhāpitaṁ buddhakiccaṁ yenāti tathā, tasmiṁ.
tika-s0104t0:153_11: etena buddhakattabbassa kiccassa kassacipi asesitabhāvaṁ dīpeti.
tika-s0104t0:153_13: Nanu ca sāvakehi vinītāpi vineyyā bhagavatāyeva vinītā nāma.
tika-s0104t0:153_17: Nāyaṁ doso tesaṁ vinayanupāyassa sāvakesu ṭhapitattā.
tika-s0104t0:154_1: yāva me bhikkhū na sāvakā bhavissanti viyattā vinītā visāradā bahussutā dhammadharā…pe…
tika-s0104t0:154_2: uppannaṁ parappavādaṁ saha dhammena suniggahitaṁ niggahetvā sapāṭihāriyaṁ dhammaṁ desessantī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:155_2: Tathā hi manussabhāvassa supākaṭakaraṇatthaṁ mahābodhisattā carimabhave dārapariggahādīnipi karontīti.
tika-s0104t0:155_4: Tañhi nagaraṁ kusahatthaṁ purisaṁ dassanaṭṭhāne māpitattā “kusināra”nti vuccati,
tika-s0104t0:155_6: Upavattane mallānaṁ sālavaneti tassa nagarassa upavattanabhūte mallarājūnaṁ sālavane.
tika-s0104t0:155_7: Tañhi sālavanaṁ nagaraṁ pavisitukāmā uyyānato upacca vattanti gacchanti etenāti upavattanaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:155_9: evaṁ taṁ uyyānaṁ kusinārāya dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṁ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:155_10: Yathā ca thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṁ pavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati,
tika-s0104t0:155_11: evaṁ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā,
tika-s0104t0:155_13: Apare pana “taṁ sālavanamupagantvā mittasuhajje apaloketvā nivattanato upavattananti pākaṭaṁ jātaṁ kirā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:155_15: Tattha kira bhagavato paññattassa parinibbānamañcassa sīsabhāge ekā sālapanti hoti,
tika-s0104t0:155_17: Tatrāpi eko taruṇasālo sīsabhāgassa āsanno hoti,
tika-s0104t0:155_20: Apica “yamakasālā nāma mūlakkhandhaviṭapapattehi aññamaññaṁ saṁsibbetvā ṭhitasālā”tipi mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:155_21: Mā iti cando vuccati tassa gatiyā divasassa minitabbato,
tika-s0104t0:155_22: tadā sabbakalāpāripūriyā puṇṇo eva māti puṇṇamā.
tika-s0104t0:155_23: Saddavidū pana “mo sivo candimā cevā”ti vuttaṁ sakkatabhāsānayaṁ gahetvā okārantampi candimavācaka ma-
tika-s0104t0:155_30: soyeva samayoti rattiyā pacchimayāmapariyāpanno kālaviseso vuccati, tasmiṁ.
tika-s0104t0:155_31: Visākhāpuṇṇamadivase īdise rattiyā pacchimasamayeti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:156_8: nibbānañca taṁ sabhāvadhāraṇato dhātu cāti katvā.
tika-s0104t0:156_9: Nibbutiyā hi kāraṇapariyāyena asaṅkhatadhātu tathā vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:156_11: Anupādisesatāsaṅkhātaṁ imaṁ pakāraṁ bhūtassa pattassa parinibbutassa bhagavato lakkhaṇe nibbānadhātusaṅkhāte atthe tatiyāti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:156_14: atha kasmā taṁ bhagavā pattoti vuttoti?
tika-s0104t0:156_16: Taṁsahacaraṇena hi bhagavāpi anupādisesabhāvaṁ pattoti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:156_17: Atha vā anupādisesabhāvasaṅkhātaṁ imaṁ pakāraṁ pattāya nibbānadhātuyā lakkhaṇe sañjānanakiriyāya tatiyātipi vattuṁ yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:156_18: Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāti ca anupādisesanibbānadhātu hutvāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:156_20: Ettha hi ūnapañcabandhanapatto hutvāti atthaṁ vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:156_21: Apica nibbānadhātuyā anupādisesāya anupādisesā hutvā bhūtāyātipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:156_22: Vuttañhi udānaṭṭhakathāya nandasuttavaṇṇanāyaṁ “upaḍḍhullikhitehi kesehīti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṁ
tika-s0104t0:156_23: vippakatullikhitehi kesehi upalakkhitāti attho”ti esanayo īdisesu.
tika-s0104t0:156_26: “ussāhaṁ janesī”ti etassa pana visesanaṁ “dhātubhājanadivase bhikkhūnaṁ ussāhaṁ janesī”ti ussāhajananassa kālavasena bhinnādhikaraṇavisesanabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:156_28: Atha vā “sannipatitāna”nti idaṁ kāyasāmaggivasena sannipatanameva sandhāya vuttaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:156_31: idañca bhikkhūnaṁ ussāhaṁ janesīti ettha “bhikkhūna”nti etenapi sambajjhanīyaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:156_33: So pana saṅgho kiṁ parimāṇoti āha “sattannaṁ bhikkhusatasahassāna”nti.
tika-s0104t0:156_34: Saṅghasaddena hi aviññāyamānassa parimāṇassa viññāpanatthamevetaṁ puna vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:159_0: Tasmā nāmamattabhūtassa saṅghattherassa visesanatthamevetaṁ puna vuttanti,
tika-s0104t0:159_1: niccasāpekkhatāya ca edisesu samāso yathā “devadattassa garukula”nti.
tika-s0104t0:159_2: Niccasāpekkhatā cettha saṅghasaddassa bhikkhusatasahassasaddaṁ sāpekkhattepi aññapadantarābhāvena vākye viya apekkhitabbatthassa gamakattā.
tika-s0104t0:159_3: “Sattannaṁ bhikkhusatasahassāna”nti hi etassa saṅghasadde avayavībhāvena sambandho,
tika-s0104t0:159_6: Tadā hi sannipatitā bhikkhū ettakāti gaṇanapathamatikkantā.
tika-s0104t0:159_7: Tathā hi veḷuvagāme vedanāvikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya “nacireneva bhagavā parinibbāyissatī”ti sutvā tato
tika-s0104t0:159_8: tato āgatesu bhikkhūsu ekabhikkhupi pakkanto nāma natthi. Yathāhu –
tika-s0104t0:162_0: Āyasmā mahākassapo anussaranto maññamāno cintayanto hutvā ussāhaṁ janesi,
tika-s0104t0:162_1: anussaranto maññamāno cintayanto āyasmā mahākassapo ussāhaṁ janesīti vā sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:162_2: Mahantehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatattā mahanto kassapoti mahākassapo.

tika-s0104t0:163_7: khurabhaṇḍaṁ ādāya nāḷiyā vā pasibbakena vā anugharakaṁ āhiṇḍatha,

tika-s0104t0:163_12: āmantetvā “hatthakammamattaṁ me dethā”ti hatthakammaṁ yācitvā “kiṁ bhante karomā”ti vutte “idañcidañca
tika-s0104t0:163_13: gaṇhathā”ti sabbūpakaraṇāni gāhāpetvā vihāre uddhanāni kāretvā ekaṁ kāḷakaṁ kāsāvaṁ nivāsetvā tādisameva

tika-s0104t0:164_3: So yathānivatthapāruteheva tehi kāḷakakāsāvehi ekena hatthena dabbiñca kaṭacchuñca gahetvā brahmā viya
tika-s0104t0:164_4: dakkhiṇaṁ jāṇumaṇḍalaṁ bhūmiyaṁ patiṭṭhapetvā vanditvā “paṭiggaṇhātu me bhante bhagavā yāgu”nti āha.

tika-s0104t0:164_7: khurabhaṇḍapariharaṇasikkhāpadañcāti dve sikkhāpadāni paññapetvā “anekakappakoṭiyo bhikkhave bhojanaṁ pariyesanteheva vītināmitā,

tika-s0104t0:164_12: Subhaddo anattamano hutvā “ayaṁ sabbaṁ jānāmī”ti āhiṇḍati,

tika-s0104t0:164_14: pakkāhāro nāma sabbaciraṁ tiṭṭhanto sattāhamattaṁ tiṭṭheyya,
tika-s0104t0:164_17: ahitakāmo ayaṁ mayha”nti bhagavati āghātaṁ bandhitvā dasabale dharamāne kiñci vattuṁ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0104t0:164_18: Evaṁ kirassa ahosi “ayaṁ uccā kulā pabbajito mahāpuriso,
tika-s0104t0:165_0: Svāyaṁ ajja mahākassapattherena saddhiṁ gacchanto “parinibbuto bhagavā”ti sutvā laddhassāso viya haṭṭhatuṭṭho evamāha.
tika-s0104t0:165_1: Thero pana taṁ sutvā hadaye pahāraṁ viya,
tika-s0104t0:165_2: matthake patitasukkhāsaniṁ viya (sukkhāsani viya dī. ni. aṭṭha.
tika-s0104t0:165_6: dukkhena bhagavatā ārādhitasāsane nāma evaṁ lahuṁ mahantaṁ pāpaṁ kasaṭaṁ kaṇṭako uppanno,
tika-s0104t0:165_7: alaṁ kho panesa pāpo vaḍḍhamāno aññepi evarūpe sahāye labhitvā sāsanaṁ osakkāpetu”nti.
tika-s0104t0:166_0: Tato thero cintesi “sace kho panāhaṁ imaṁ mahallakaṁ idheva pilotikaṁ nivāsetvā chārikāya okirāpetvā nīharāpessāmi,
tika-s0104t0:166_1: manussā ‘samaṇassa gotamassa sarīre dharamāneyeva sāvakā vivadantī’ti amhākaṁ dosaṁ dassessanti,
tika-s0104t0:166_4: tattha yathā vātena pahaṭapupphāni yato vā tato vā gacchanti,
tika-s0104t0:166_5: evameva evarūpānaṁ vasena gacchante gacchante kāle vinaye ekaṁ dve sikkhāpadāni nassissanti,
tika-s0104t0:166_8: evaṁ anukkamena mūle naṭṭhe pisācasadisā bhavissāma,
tika-s0104t0:166_10: evaṁ sati daḷhasuttena saṅgahitapupphāni viya ayaṁ dhammavinayo niccalo bhavissati.
tika-s0104t0:166_11: Etadatthañhi bhagavā mayhaṁ tīṇi gāvutāni paccuggamanaṁ akāsi,
tika-s0104t0:166_14: ākāse pāṇiṁ cāletvā candopamapaṭipadaṁ kathento maññeva sakkhiṁ katvā kathesi,
tika-s0104t0:166_16: mādise bhikkhumhi tiṭṭhamāne ayaṁ pāpo sāsane vaḍḍhiṁ mā alattha,
tika-s0104t0:166_26: tato bhikkhū attano attano pahonakaṁ gahetvā kappiyākappiye kathessanti,
tika-s0104t0:166_29: sāsanaṁ iddhañceva phīttañca bhavissatī”ti cintetvā so “evaṁ nāma mayhaṁ cittaṁ uppanna”nti kassacipi
tika-s0104t0:166_30: anārocetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ samassāsetvā atha pacchā dhātubhājanadivase dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ
tika-s0104t0:167_3: Mā socitthāti citte uppannabalavasokena mā sokamakattha.
tika-s0104t0:170_1: Tattha īdisassa ca saṅghasannipātassāti sattasatasahassagaṇapāmokkhattherappamukhagaṇanapathātikkantasaṅghasannipātaṁ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0104t0:170_2: “Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ vijjatī”tiādināpi aññaṁ kāraṇaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:170_3: Tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṁ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṁ, hetu.
tika-s0104t0:170_13: Pāpena lāmakena icchāvacarena samannāgatā bhikkhū pāpabhikkhū.
tika-s0104t0:170_17: saddo cettha nipāto “pā eva vutyassā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t0:170_19: dīghaṁ katvā pana tathā vuttaṁ yathā “pāvadatī”tipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:171_0: Tattha yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhatīti yattakaṁ kālaṁ dhammo ca vinayo ca lajjipuggalesu tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0104t0:171_1: Parinibbānamañcake nipannena bhagavatā mahāparinibbānasutte vuttaṁ sandhāya “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Hi-
tika-s0104t0:171_3: Desito paññattoti dhammopi desito ceva paññatto ca.
tika-s0104t0:171_4: Suttābhidhammasaṅgahitassa hi dhammassa atisajjanaṁ pabodhanaṁ desanā,
tika-s0104t0:171_5: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṁ vineyyasantāne ṭhapanaṁ paññāpanaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:171_7: Vinayatantisaṅgahitassa hi atthassa atisajjanaṁ pabodhanaṁ desanā,
tika-s0104t0:171_8: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṁ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṁ paññāpanaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:171_9: tasmā kammadvayampi kiriyādvayena sambajjhanaṁ yujjatīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:172_0: Soti so dhammo ca vinayo ca.
tika-s0104t0:172_4: mama accayahetu tumhākaṁ satthā nāma bhavissatīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:172_5: Vuttañhi mahāparinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṁ “mayi parinibbute tumhākaṁ satthukiccaṁ sādhessatī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:172_6: Lakkhaṇavacanañhettha hetvatthasādhakaṁ yathā “nette ujuṁ gate satī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:172_16: ayaṁ saṅghassa santike vuṭṭhātī”ti sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ avītikkamanīyatāvasena otiṇṇavatthusmiṁ
tika-s0104t0:172_18: taṁ sakalampi vinayapiṭakaṁ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṁ satthukiccaṁ sādhessati “idaṁ vo kattabbaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:172_19: idaṁ vo na kattabba”nti kattabbākattabbassa vibhāgena anusāsanato.
tika-s0104t0:172_26: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti tena tena vineyyānaṁ ajjhāsayānurūpena pakārena ime sattatiṁsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme
tika-s0104t0:172_28: taṁ sakalampi suttantapiṭakaṁ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṁ satthukiccaṁ sādhessati taṁtaṁcariyānurūpaṁ sammāpaṭipattiyā anusāsanato,
tika-s0104t0:172_47: ettakā lokuttarā”ti ime dhamme vibhajitvā vibhajitvā abhidhammapiṭakaṁ desitaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:172_48: taṁ sakalampi abhidhammapiṭakaṁ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṁ satthukiccaṁ sādhessati khandhādivibhāgena ñāyamānaṁ catusaccasambodhāvahattā.
tika-s0104t0:172_49: Iti sabbampetaṁ abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā pañcacattālīsa vassāni bhāsitaṁ lapitaṁ “tīṇi piṭakāni,
tika-s0104t0:172_56: mayi parinibbute imāni caturāsīti buddhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti anusāsissanti ovādānusāsanakiccassa nipphādanatoti.
tika-s0104t0:173_8: tena pakārena dhammañca vinayañca yadi panāhaṁ saṅgāyeyyaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:174_0: Idāni sammāsambuddhena attano kataṁ anuggahavisesaṁ samanussaritvā cintanākārampi dassento “yañcāhaṁ bhagavatā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:174_8: “Dhāressasī”tiādikaṁ pana vacanaṁ bhagavā aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle mahākassapattherena paññattasaṅghāṭiyaṁ
tika-s0104t0:174_9: nisinno taṁ saṅghāṭiṁ padumapupphavaṇṇena pāṇinā antantena parāmasanto āha.
tika-s0104t0:174_10: Vuttañhetaṁ kassapasaṁyutte mahākassapatthereneva ānandattheraṁ āmantetvā kathentena –
tika-s0104t0:175_0: “Atha kho āvuso bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataraṁ rukkhamūlaṁ tenupasaṅkami,
tika-s0104t0:175_1: atha khvāhaṁ āvuso paṭapilotikānaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ catugguṇaṁ paññapetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavocaṁ ‘idha bhante bhagavā nisīdatu,
tika-s0104t0:175_3: Nisīdi kho āvuso bhagavā paññatte āsane,
tika-s0104t0:175_4: nisajja kho maṁ āvuso bhagavā etadavoca ‘mudukā kho tyāyaṁ kassapa paṭapilotikānaṁ saṅghāṭī’ti.
tika-s0104t0:175_5: Paṭiggaṇhātu me bhante bhagavā paṭapilotikānaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ anukampaṁ upādāyāti.
tika-s0104t0:175_6: Dhāressasi pana me tvaṁ kassapa sāṇāni paṁsukūlāni nibbasanānīti.
tika-s0104t0:175_7: Dhāressāmahaṁ bhante bhagavato sāṇāni paṁsukūlāni nibbasanānīti.
tika-s0104t0:175_8: So khvāhaṁ āvuso paṭapilotikānaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ bhagavato pādāsiṁ,
tika-s0104t0:175_9: ahaṁ pana bhagavato sāṇāni paṁsukūlāni nibbasanāni paṭipajji”nti.
tika-s0104t0:176_0: Tattha mudukā kho tyāyanti mudukā kho te ayaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:176_6: evaṁ panassa ahosi “ime na ciraṁ ṭhassanti,
tika-s0104t0:176_8: so mayi parinibbute sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṁ vasitvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṁ katvā mama sāsanaṁ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālaṁ
tika-s0104t0:176_9: pavattanakaṁ karissatī”ti attano naṁ ṭhāne ṭhapesi,
tika-s0104t0:176_10: evaṁ bhikkhū kassapassa sussusitabbaṁ maññissantī”ti tasmā evamāha.
tika-s0104t0:176_11: Thero pana yasmā cīvarassa vā pattassa vā vaṇṇe kathite “imaṁ tumhe gaṇhathā”ti vacanaṁ cārittameva,
tika-s0104t0:177_0: Dhāressasipana me tvaṁ kassapāti kassapa tvaṁ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni paṁsukūlāni pārupituṁ sakkhissasīti vadati.
tika-s0104t0:177_4: ahaṁ imaṁ cīvaraṁ puṇṇaṁ nāma dāsiṁ pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṁ susānaṁ pavisitvā tumbamattehi pāṇakehi
tika-s0104t0:177_5: samparikiṇṇaṁ te pāṇake vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṁse ṭhatvā aggahesiṁ,
tika-s0104t0:177_6: tassa me imaṁ cīvaraṁ gahitadivase dasasahassacakkavāḷe mahāpathavī mahāviravaṁ viravamānā kampittha,
tika-s0104t0:177_9: imaṁ cīvaraṁ gaṇhantena bhikkhunā jātipaṁsukūlikena jātiāraññikena jātiekāsanikena jātisapadānacārikena bhavituṁ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t0:177_10: tvaṁ imassa cīvarassa anucchavikaṁ kātuṁ sakkhissasīti.
tika-s0104t0:177_11: Theropi attanā pañcannaṁ hatthīnaṁ balaṁ dhāreti,
tika-s0104t0:177_12: so taṁ atakkayitvā “ahametaṁ paṭipattiṁ pūressāmī”ti ussāhena sugatacīvarassa anucchavikaṁ kātukāmo “dhāressāmahaṁ bhante”ti āha.
tika-s0104t0:177_14: Evaṁ pana cīvaraparivattanaṁ katvā therena pārupitacīvaraṁ bhagavā pārupi,
tika-s0104t0:177_16: Tasmiṁ samaye mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṁ katvā unnadantī kampittha.
tika-s0104t0:178_0: Sāṇāni paṁsukūlānīti matakaḷevaraṁ pariveṭhetvā chaḍḍitāni tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā gahitāni sāṇavākamayāni paṁsukūlacīvarāni.
tika-s0104t0:178_3: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ekameva taṁ cīvaraṁ,
tika-s0104t0:178_4: anekāvayavattā pana bahuvacanaṁ katanti majjhimagaṇṭhipade vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:178_5: Cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti atthassa viññāyamānattā,
tika-s0104t0:178_6: viññāyamānatthassa ca saddassa payoge kāmācārattā “attanā”ti na vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:178_7: “Dhāressasi pana me tvaṁ kassapa sāṇāni paṁsukūlānī”ti hi vuttattā “attanāva sādhāraṇaparibhogenā”ti viññāyati, nāññena.
tika-s0104t0:178_8: Na hi kevalaṁ saddatoyeva sabbattha atthanicchayo,
tika-s0104t0:178_10: Ācariyadhammapālattherena panettha evaṁ vuttaṁ “cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha ‘attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenā’ti idha vuttaṁ attanā –
tika-s0104t0:179_0: Yassa yena hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhampi ca tassa taṁ;
tika-s0104t0:181_0: Atha vā bhagavatā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena bhagavatā anuggahitoti yojanīyaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:181_4: Sādhāraṇaparibhogena ca samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahitoti sambandho.

tika-s0104t0:184_0: Navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāpabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanatthāya bhagavatā vuttaṁ
tika-s0104t0:184_2: ādiggahaṇena ca saṅkhipitvā dassento āha “ahaṁ bhikkhave”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:185_4: cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca “yāvadeti yāvadevāti vuttaṁ hotī”ti likhitaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:185_5: Saṁyuttaṭṭhakathāyampi “yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmī”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0104t0:185_6: Tathā hi tattha līnatthapakāsaniyaṁ ācariyadhammapālattherena “yāvadevāti iminā samānatthaṁ ‘yāvade’ti idaṁ pada”nti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:185_7: Potthakesu pana katthaci “yāvadevā”ti ayameva pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0104t0:185_8: Api ca yāvadeti yattakaṁ samāpattivihāraṁ viharituṁ ākaṅkhāmi,
tika-s0104t0:185_11: tattakaṁ abhiññāvohāraṁ voharāmīti abhiññāṭhāne ca saha pāṭhasesena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:185_13: abhiññāvohāre vā ākaṅkhanto vihārāmi ceva voharāmi ca,
tika-s0104t0:185_19: tena dibbasotena sadde suṇāmī’tiādinā sesābhiññāṭhāne karaṇavasena yojanā vattabbā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:186_0: Navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhedeti ettha navānupubbavihārā nāma anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabbattā evaṁsaññitā
tika-s0104t0:186_4: So anadhippeto yathāvuttāya pāḷiyā gahetabbassa atthassa anavasesattā.
tika-s0104t0:186_7: uttarīnaṁ vā manussānaṁ jhāyīnañceva ariyānañca dhammoti uttarimanussadhammo,
tika-s0104t0:186_9: Dasa kusalakammapathā cettha vinā bhāvanāmanasikārena pakatiyāva manussehi nibbattetabbato,
tika-s0104t0:186_11: tato uttari pana jhānādi uttarimanussadhammoti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:186_15: tathā kassapopī”ti evaṁ samasamaṁ katvā ṭhapanena.
tika-s0104t0:186_17: kassacipi uttarimanussadhammassa asesabhāvena ekantasamaṭṭhapanaṁ vā sandhāya “samasamaṭṭhapanenā”ti vuttaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:186_19: Na hi āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavā viya devasikaṁ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā samāpattiyo samāpajjati,
tika-s0104t0:186_21: Ettha ca uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenā”ti idaṁ nidassanamattanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:187_2: ahaṁ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṁ, tvaṁ vā.
tika-s0104t0:187_3: Ahaṁ vā kassapa bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ kareyyaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:189_2: Ākāse pāṇiṁ cāletvāti bhagavatā attanoyeva pāṇiṁ ākāse cāletvā kulesu alaggacittatāya ceva karaṇabhūtāya pasaṁsitoti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:189_4: ākāse pāṇiṁ cāletvā kulūpakassa bhikkhuno alaggacittatāya kulesu alagganacittena bhavituṁ yuttatāya ceva maññeva sakkhiṁ katvā pasaṁsitoti attho. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t0:190_0: “Atha kho bhagavā ākāse pāṇiṁ cālesi seyyathāpi bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t0:190_1: ayaṁ ākāse pāṇi na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati,
tika-s0104t0:190_2: evameva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kulāni upasaṅkamato kulesu cittaṁ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati ‘labhantu lābhakāmā,
tika-s0104t0:190_4: Yathā sakena lābhena attamano hoti sumano,
tika-s0104t0:190_5: evaṁ paresaṁ lābhena attamano hoti sumano.
tika-s0104t0:190_6: Evarūpo kho bhikkhave bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṁ.
tika-s0104t0:190_7: Kassapassa bhikkhave kulāni upasaṅkamato kulesu cittaṁ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati ‘labhantu lābhakāmā,
tika-s0104t0:190_9: Yathā sakena lābhena attamano hoti sumano,
tika-s0104t0:190_10: evaṁ paresaṁ lābhena attamano hoti sumano”ti.
tika-s0104t0:191_0: Tattha ākāse pāṇiṁ cālesīti nīle gaganantare yamakavijjukaṁ sañcālayamāno viya heṭṭhābhāge,
tika-s0104t0:191_3: idañca pana tepiṭake buddhavacane asambhinnapadaṁ nāma.
tika-s0104t0:191_7: idāni yo hīnādhimuttiko micchāpaṭipanno evaṁ vadeyya “sammāsambuddho ‘alaggacittatāya ākāse cālitapāṇūpamā
tika-s0104t0:191_12: tassa vādapathaṁ pacchinditvā “sakkā ca kho evaṁ kātuṁ,
tika-s0104t0:191_13: atthi evarūpo bhikkhū”ti āyasmantaṁ mahākassapattherameva sakkhiṁ katvā dassento “kassapassa bhikkhave”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:192_2: tassaṁ vā ādhārabhūtāya maññeva sakkhiṁ katvā pasaṁsitoti attho. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t0:193_2: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso jarudapānaṁ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṁ vā nadīviduggaṁ vā apakasseva kāyaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:193_4: evameva kho bhikkhave candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:193_6: Kassapo bhikkhave candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati apakasseva kāyaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:194_2: apica kho yathā cando gaganatalaṁ pakkhandamāno na kenaci saddhiṁ santhavaṁ vā sinehaṁ vā ālayaṁ vā nikantiṁ vā patthanaṁ vā pariyuṭṭhānaṁ vā karoti,
tika-s0104t0:194_3: na ca na hoti mahājanassa piyo manāpo,
tika-s0104t0:194_4: tumhepi evaṁ kenaci saddhiṁ santhavādīnaṁ akaraṇena bahujanassa piyā manāpā candūpamā hutvā khattiyakulādīni cattāri kulāni upasaṅkamathāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:194_8: ñāṇālokapharaṇena ca candūpamā hutvāti evamādīhipi nayehi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:195_1: apakassa cittanti teneva santhavādīnamakaraṇena kāyañca cittañca apakassitvā,
tika-s0104t0:195_5: Āgantuko hi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagehaṁ pavisitvā sace naṁ gharasāmikā disvā “amhākaṁ puttabhātaropi vippavāsagatā
tika-s0104t0:195_8: na tehi saddhiṁ santhavaṁ vā karoti,
tika-s0104t0:195_10: evaṁ tumhepi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagharaṁ pavisitvā yaṁ iriyāpathesu pasannā manussā denti,
tika-s0104t0:195_11: taṁ gahetvā pacchinnasanthavā tesaṁ kiccakaraṇīye abyāvaṭā hutvā nikkhamathāti dīpeti.
tika-s0104t0:195_15: anekaṭṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena ca virahitā kulāni upasaṅkamathāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:196_6: yathā pana anapakaṭṭhakāyacitto tāni olokento puriso tattha patati,
tika-s0104t0:196_7: evaṁ arakkhitehi kāyādīhi kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu bajjhati,
tika-s0104t0:196_9: Yathā pana apakaṭṭhakāyacitto puriso tattha na patati,
tika-s0104t0:196_13: sūpaṭṭhitāya satiyā apakaṭṭhakāyacitto hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu na bajjhati,
tika-s0104t0:196_17: evarūpo ayaṁ mahākassapoti hīnādhimuttikassa micchāpaṭipannassa vādapathapacchindanatthaṁ mahākassapattheraṁ
tika-s0104t0:196_20: tassaṁ vā ādhārabhūtāya maññeva sakkhiṁ katvā pasaṁsitoti,
tika-s0104t0:196_22: saddo ca na payujjitabbo dvinnaṁ padānaṁ tulyādhikaraṇattā,
tika-s0104t0:196_23: ayameva attho pāṭho ca yuttataro viya dissati parinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṁ “ākāse pāṇiṁ cāletvā candūpamaṁ
tika-s0104t0:196_24: paṭipadaṁ kathento maṁ kāyasakkhiṁ katvā kathesī”ti vuttattāti.
tika-s0104t0:197_3: saddassa kāraṇanidassane “tasmā”ti ajjhāharitvā tassa meti attho,
tika-s0104t0:197_10: Dhammavinayasaṅgāyanaṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ kiṁ nāma tassa iṇavirahitattaṁ bhavissati,
tika-s0104t0:197_21: puttaṁ rājā viya bhagavāpi maṁ dīghadassī “saddhammavaṁsappatiṭṭhāpako me ayaṁ bhavissatī”ti mantvā sāsanapaccatthikagaṇanimmaddanena
tika-s0104t0:197_22: saddhammavaṁsappatiṭṭhāpanatthaṁ cīvaradānasamasamaṭṭhapanasaṅkhātena iminā asādhāraṇānuggahena anuggahesi nanu,
tika-s0104t0:197_23: imāya ca uḷārāya pasaṁsāya pasaṁsi nanūti.
tika-s0104t0:198_2: mayā vuttassa atthassa sādhakaṁ kiṁ āhāti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:198_3: Yathā vā yena pakārena mayā vuttaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:198_4: tathā tena pakārena pāḷiyampi āhāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:198_5: Yathā vā yaṁ vacanaṁ pāḷiyaṁ āha,
tika-s0104t0:198_6: tathā tena vacanena mayā vuttavacanaṁ saṁsandati ceva sameti ca yathā taṁ gaṅgodakena yamunodakantipi
tika-s0104t0:198_7: vattabbo pāḷiyā sādhanatthaṁ udāharitabhāvassa paccakkhato viññāyamānattā,
tika-s0104t0:198_10: Yathā vā yena pakārena dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ussāhaṁ janesi,
tika-s0104t0:198_11: tathā tena pakārena pāḷiyampi āhāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:199_4: tattha piṇḍāya caritvā “kusināraṁ gamissāmī”ti addhānamaggappaṭipannoti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:199_10: “Dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṁ ussāhaṁ janesī”ti etassatthassa sādhanatthaṁ āhatā “atha kho”tiādikā pāḷi yathāvuttamatthaṁ na sādheti.
tika-s0104t0:199_11: Na hettha ussāhajananappakāro āgatoti codanaṁ pariharitumāha “sabbaṁ subhaddakaṇḍaṁ vitthārato veditabba”nti.
tika-s0104t0:199_12: Evampesā codanā tadavatthāyevāti vuttaṁ “tato paraṁ āhā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:199_13: Apica yathāvuttatthasādhikā pāḷi mahatarāti ganthagarutāpariharaṇatthaṁ majjhe peyyālamukhena ādiantameva
tika-s0104t0:199_14: pāḷiṁ dassento “sabbaṁ subhaddakaṇḍaṁ vitthārato veditabba”nti āha.
tika-s0104t0:199_15: Tena hi “atha khvāhaṁ āvuso maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisīdī”ti vuttapāḷito paṭṭhāya “yaṁ na icchissāma,
tika-s0104t0:199_16: na taṁ karissāmā”ti vuttapāḷipariyosānaṁ subhaddakaṇḍaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:200_0: “Tato para”ntiādinā pana tadavasesaṁ “handa mayaṁ āvuso”tiādikaṁ ussāhajananappakāradassanapāḷiṁ.
tika-s0104t0:200_1: Tasmā tato paraṁ āhāti ettha subhaddakaṇḍato paraṁ ussāhajananappakāradassanavacanamāhāti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:200_4: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “tato paranti tato bhikkhūnaṁ ussāhajananato parato”ti vuttaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:200_5: tadetaṁ vicāretabbaṁ heṭṭhā ussāhajananappakārassa pāḷiyaṁ avuttattā.
tika-s0104t0:200_6: Ayameva hi ussāhajananappakāro yadidaṁ “handa mayaṁ āvuso dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
tika-s0104t0:200_8: Yadi pana subhaddakaṇḍameva ussāhajananahetubhūtassa subhaddena vuttavacanassa pakāsanattā ussāhajanananti vadeyya,
tika-s0104t0:200_10: Pure adhammo dippatīti ettha adhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathapaṭipakkhabhūto adhammo.
tika-s0104t0:200_11: Dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṁ ussāhajananappasaṅgattā vā tadasaṅgāyanahetuko dosagaṇopi sambhavati,
tika-s0104t0:200_13: dhammavādino dubbalā hontī”ti vuttattā sīlavipattiādihetuko pāpicchatādidosagaṇo adhammotipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:200_16: Atha vā yāva adhammo dhammaṁ paṭibāhituṁ samattho hoti,
tika-s0104t0:200_18: Āsanne hi anadhippete ayaṁ pure- saddo.
tika-s0104t0:200_20: saddayogena hi anāgatatthe ayaṁ vattamānapayogo yathā “purā vassati devo”ti.
tika-s0104t0:204_0: Lacchāyamapi kiṁ vutte, vattamānā bhavissatī”ti ca.
tika-s0104t0:205_4: Evaṁ sati taṁkālāpekkhāya cettha vattamānapayogo sambhavati.
tika-s0104t0:206_1: Uccinane uyyojentā hi mahākassapattheraṁ evamāhaṁsu “bhikkhū uccinatū”ti,
tika-s0104t0:206_2: saṅgītiyā anurūpe bhikkhū uccinitvā upadhāretvā gaṇhātūti attho.
tika-s0104t0:206_4: pariggahesī”ti etena sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavapariyantānaṁ yathāvuttapuggalānaṁ satipi āgamādhigamasambhave
tika-s0104t0:206_5: saha paṭisambhidāhi pana tevijjādiguṇayuttānaṁ āgamādhigamasampattiyā ukkaṁsagatattā saṅgītiyā bahūpakārataṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:206_8: satthu bhagavato sāsanaṁ satthusāsanaṁ sāsīyati etenāti katvā,
tika-s0104t0:206_16: diṭṭhadhammikādipurisatthaṁ vā nipphādetuṁ pariyattā samatthāti pariyatti,
tika-s0104t0:209_0: Vuttesu kalyāṇaputhujjanāva adhippetā saddantarasannidhānenapi atthavisesassa viññātabbattā.
tika-s0104t0:209_1: Samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena sukkhā lūkhā asiniddhā vipassanā etesanti sukkhavipassakā,
tika-s0104t0:212_0: Tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhareti ettha tiṇṇaṁ piṭakānaṁ samāhāro tipiṭakaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:212_1: taṁsaṅkhātaṁ navaṅgādivasena anekabhedabhinnaṁ sabbaṁ pariyattippabhedaṁ dhārentīti tathā, tādise.
tika-s0104t0:212_2: Anu anu taṁ samaṅginaṁ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti anubhāvo,
tika-s0104t0:212_5: “Etadaggaṁ bhikkhave”ti bhagavatā vuttavacanamupādāya pavattattā “etadagga”nti padaṁ anukaraṇajanāmaṁ nāma yathā “yevāpanaka”nti,
tika-s0104t0:212_8: Etadaggaṁ eso bhikkhu aggoti vā āropitepi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t0:212_9: Tadanāropitāpi avasesaguṇasampannattā uccinitā tattha santīti dassetuṁ “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:212_13: Atha vā tisso vijjā assa khīṇāsavassāti tevijjo,
tika-s0104t0:212_17: Ye sandhāya vuttanti ye bhikkhū sandhāya idaṁ “atha kho”tiādivacanaṁ saṅgītikkhandhake vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:212_19: tathāpi visesena yathāvuttakhīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva sandhāya vuttanti pāḷiyā saṁsandanaṁ karoti.
tika-s0104t0:213_2: kasmā thero ekenūnamakāsīti codanaṁ uddharitvā visesakāraṇadassanena taṁ pariharituṁ “kissa panā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:213_6: saddo hi “chaṇatthañca nagarato nikkhamitvā missakapabbataṁ abhiruhatū”tiādīsu viya kāraṇavacano,
tika-s0104t0:213_8: Tathā hi vaṇṇayanti “chaṇatthanti chaṇanimittaṁ chaṇahetūti attho”ti.
tika-s0104t0:214_2: “So hāyasmā”tiādinā “sahāpi vināpi na sakkā”ti vuttavacane paccekaṁ kāraṇaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:214_13: na asekkho viya pariniṭṭhitasikkho tattha paṭippassaddhussāho,
tika-s0104t0:214_14: nāpi vissaṭṭhasikkho pacurajano viya tattha anadhimutto,
tika-s0104t0:214_15: kitavasena viya ca taddhitavasenidha tappakatiyattho gayhati yathā “kāruṇiko”ti.
tika-s0104t0:214_16: Atha vā ariyāya jātiyā tīsupi sikkhāsu jāto,
tika-s0104t0:214_26: Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana “asammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṁ,
tika-s0104t0:214_27: taṁ” dve sahassāni bhikkhuto”ti vuttampi bhagavato santike paṭiggahitameva nāmāti katvā vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:215_1: Ayañhi gāthā gopakamoggallānena nāma brāhmaṇena “buddhasāsane tvaṁ bahussutoti pākaṭo,
tika-s0104t0:215_3: tayā ca dhāritā”ti pucchitena tassa paṭivacanaṁ dentena āyasmatā ānandeneva gopakamoggallānasutte,
tika-s0104t0:215_6: buddhato satthu santikā dvāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni ahaṁ gaṇhiṁ adhigaṇhiṁ,
tika-s0104t0:215_7: dve dhammakkhandhasahassāni bhikkhuto dhammasenāpatiādīnaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ santikā gaṇhiṁ.
tika-s0104t0:215_10: te dhammā tadubhayaṁ sampiṇḍetvā caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti.
tika-s0104t0:215_11: Keci pana “yemeti ettha ‘ye ime’ti padacchedaṁ katvā ye ime dhammā buddhassa,
tika-s0104t0:215_13: tesu dhammesu buddhato dvāsīti sahassāni ahaṁ gaṇhiṁ,
tika-s0104t0:215_16: ayañca sambandho “ettakāyeva dhammakkhandhā”ti sanniṭṭhānassa aviññāyamānattā kecivādo nāma kato.
tika-s0104t0:216_0: “Sahāpi na sakkā”ti vattabbahetuto “vināpi na sakkā”ti vattabbahetuyeva balavataro saṅgītiyā bahukārattā.
tika-s0104t0:216_1: Tasmā tattha codanaṁ dassetvā pariharituṁ “yadi eva”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0104t0:216_2: Tattha yadi evanti evaṁ vinā yadi na sakkā,
tika-s0104t0:216_12: Pañhe “atha tvaṁ kena vaṇṇenā”ti hi payogamudāharanti.
tika-s0104t0:216_14: Parūpavādavivajjanatoti yathāvuttakāraṇaṁ ajānantānaṁ paresaṁ āropitaupavādato vivajjitukāmattā.
tika-s0104t0:216_20: tathā hi iccete daḷhīkaraṇatthe”ti hi vadanti saddavidū.
tika-s0104t0:216_23: Ānandattherassa yebhuyyena navakāya parisāya vibbhamane mahākassapatthero “na vāyaṁ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti āha.
tika-s0104t0:216_24: Tathā hi parinibbute bhagavati mahākassapatthero bhagavato parinibbāne sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-s0104t0:216_25: majjhe nisīditvā dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṁ pañcasate bhikkhū uccinitvā “rājagahe āvuso vassaṁ vasantā
tika-s0104t0:216_27: tumhe pure vassūpanāyikāya attano attano palibodhaṁ pacchinditvā rājagahe sannipatathā”ti vatvā attanā rājagahaṁ gato.
tika-s0104t0:217_0: Ānandattheropi bhagavato pattacīvaramādāya mahājanaṁ saññāpento sāvatthiṁ gantvā tato nikkhamma rājagahaṁ gacchanto dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ cārikaṁ cari.
tika-s0104t0:217_1: Tasmiṁ samaye ānandattherassa tiṁsamattā saddhivihārikā yebhuyyena kumārakā ekavassikaduvassikabhikkhū ceva anupasampannā ca vibbhamiṁsu.
tika-s0104t0:217_4: Tesaṁ kira mātāpitaro cintesuṁ “ānandatthero satthuvissāsiko aṭṭha vare yācitvā upaṭṭhahati,
tika-s0104t0:217_8: tasmiṁ āgate mayaṁ mahāsakkāraṁ kātuṁ labhissāmā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:217_9: Iminā tāva kāraṇena nesaṁ ñātakā te pabbājesuṁ,
tika-s0104t0:217_10: satthari pana parinibbute tesaṁ sā patthanā upacchinnā,
tika-s0104t0:217_12: Atha ānandattheraṁ dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ cārikaṁ caritvā rājagahamāgataṁ disvā mahākassapatthero evamāhāti.
tika-s0104t0:218_0: “Atha kiñcarahi tvaṁ āvuso ānanda imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṁ ananuyuttehi saddhiṁ cārikaṁ carasi,
tika-s0104t0:218_3: olujjati kho te āvuso ānanda parisā,
tika-s0104t0:219_0: Api me bhante kassapa sirasmiṁ palitāni jātāni,
tika-s0104t0:219_1: atha ca pana mayaṁ ajjāpi āyasmato mahākassapassa kumārakavādā na muccāmāti.
tika-s0104t0:219_2: Tathā hi pana tvaṁ āvuso ānanda imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṁ ananuyuttehi saddhiṁ cārikaṁ carasi,
tika-s0104t0:219_5: olujjati kho te āvuso ānanda parisā,
tika-s0104t0:220_0: Tattha sassaghātaṁ maññe carasīti sassaṁ ghātento viya āhiṇḍasi.
tika-s0104t0:220_1: Kulūpaghātaṁ maññe carasīti kulāni upaghātento viya āhiṇḍasi.

tika-s0104t0:221_3: Tathā hesa “paṇḍito vāpi tena so”tiādīsu upamāne dissati,

tika-s0104t0:230_1: Nette jimhagate sati nette kuṭilaṁ gate sati,

tika-s0104t0:241_0: Sattipañjaraṁkatvāti sattikhaggādihatthehi purisehi mallarājūnaṁ bhagavato dhātuārakkhakaraṇaṁ upalakkhaṇavasenāha.

tika-s0104t0:242_9: atikkanto”ti vuttaṁ dvāsītikhandhakavattānaṁ katthaci “asīti khandhakavattānī”ti vacanaṁ viya,

tika-s0104t0:242_11: seso”ti vuttaṁ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṁ chamāsato ūnepi aḍḍhamāse “chamāsaṁ sajjhāyo kātabbo”ti
tika-s0104t0:242_14: Apica dīghabhāṇakānaṁ matena tiṇṇaṁ sattāhānaṁ vasena “ekavīsati divasā gatā”ti idha vuttaṁ.
